name: Stranger More: multiplayer mode
description:
Welcome, my Friend. 

This is official multiplayer mode for Stranger More!

Run the game and enjoy playing with your friends!

Voice chat can help you to communicate with other players.

Create room or connect room and play 5 min match per player.

Max players count per match: 100 players.

Also visit the website of the game: https://stranger-more.neocities.org/
